name: Team'in Down
description:
IF YOU WANT TO BEAT THE BOSS, THEN YOU HAVE TO DOWNLOAD THE GAME! I uploaded this game so fast that I didn't notice that error... :I

In this top down dungeon game your goal is to save your friend and escape! But its not that easy, the dungeon is full of shooting triangles! Good luck!  

Developers:

Gabest - Game design, programming and idea.

Juuhokki - Pixel art, music and sound effects. 

Made in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Thank you for playing! We would love some feedback!
